name: Josh & Amy
text:
We love our church and see H4TH as an investment into it's future and our family. We want to see church moving forward, taking ground and reaching people in this city.
              We give because we've seen time and time again how God is faithful. When we put His House first and build that, He is always faithful to take care of us. We give because we want our lives and finances to be attached to something eternal.
